people_also_ask.heading: Capcom Co., Ltd() is a Japanese video game developer and publisher. ... Capcom has been releasing games for Nintendo's platforms since 1985 and has developed games for Nintendo, like The Legend of Zelda: Oracle of Seasons and The Legend of Zelda: Oracle of Ages.

people_also_ask.heading: Monster Hunter: World
people_also_ask.heading2: As of September 2021, Monster Hunter: World was gaming publisher Capcom's best-selling title with over 17.5 million unit sales. The action-role playing game was released in 2018. The game's expansion pack Monster World: Iceborne (2019) sold an additional 8.5 million copies.

knowledge_panel.description: capcom co., ltd. is a japanese video game developer and publisher. it has created a number of multi-million-selling game franchises, with its most commercially successful being resident evil, monster hunter, street fighter, mega man, devil may cry, dead rising, and marvel vs. capcom. wikipedia
